org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Interface RiverMouth

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OneShotRiverMouth, SimpleRiverMouth, TableRiverMouth

    public interface RiverMouth
    The river mouth is the abstraction of the destination where all the data is flowing from the river source.
    Author:
    JÃ¶rg Prante

      • create

        void create(StructuredObject object)
            throws IOException
        Create. Indicating that an object has been built and is ready to be indexed. The source of the document is held by the XContentBuilder. The document is only indexed if no document with that index/type/id exists.
        Parameters:
        object - the structured object
        Throws:
        IOException

      • index

        void index(StructuredObject object)
           throws IOException
        Index. Indicating that an object has been built and is ready to be indexed. The source of the document is held by the XContentBuilder.
        Parameters:
        object - the indexable object
        Throws:
        IOException
